summary: Encapsulates a GPT‑style neural network model, handling initialization, optional pruning of attention heads, forward inference, and retrieval of the model's input embedding matrix.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use, customizable language model that can be fine‑tuned or optimized for downstream applications such as text generation or segmentation, while offering mechanisms to reduce computational load via head pruning and to expose embeddings for integration with other components.
